docs.lead_paragraph: TRENTON, May 3--The accreditation of at least one state psychiatric hospital will be in serious jeopardy because of cuts in the 1978-79 budget to be noted on in the Legislature tomorrow, according to the state's Human Services Commissioner, Ann Klein.

headline.main: BUDGET CUTS TERMED PERIL TO HOSPITALS; One State Psychiatric Institution Faces Loss of its Accreditation, Human Services Head Asserts Only a One-Year Term Seek to Save Jobs Extra Funds Held Possible

docs.abstract: Comr Ann Klein warns expected Legis budget cuts will jeopardize accreditation of at least 1 psychiatric hosp and cost state Fed aid, int; sets tentative cutbacks; has asked $2.9-million in cuts be restored to $90-million mental-health budget (M)
docs.snippet: TRENTON, May 3--The accreditation of at least one state psychiatric hospital will be in serious jeopardy because of cuts in the 1978-79 budget to be noted on in the Legislature tomorrow, according to the state's Human Services Commissioner, Ann...

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: BALDNESS undoubtedly contributed to the success of actors Yul Brynner and Telly Savalas and the high fashion model Pat Evans. But somehow the glamour of their gleaming pates never caught on with the average man or woman.

headline.main: Hair Loss; Personal Health Personal Health

docs.abstract: Causes of baldness revd; drawings; treatments and cosmetic remedies assessed (M)
docs.snippet: BALDNESS undoubtedly contributed to the success of actors Yul Brynner and Telly Savalas and the high  fashion model Pat Evans. But somehow the glamour of their gleaming pates never caught on with the average man or woman.
